question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn right. fly down the street to to the yellow building, stopping over the building front of it. turn right, fly over the building in front of you and down to the one behind it. turn left, flying to the stairs at the columns building.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I fly over buildings.  
B. I fly in front of a building.  
C. I fly across the water.  
D. I turn back.  
E. I turn right at the building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent flying over various buildings, which aligns with the instruction to "fly over the building in front of you and down to the one behind it." This indicates that the agent is currently flying over buildings as part of the navigation task.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 17)]
Option: [A]
Reason: From the beginning of the video to 17 seconds, the agent is flying over the building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: A; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent flying over various buildings, which aligns with the instruction to "fly over the building in front of you and down to the one behind it." This indicates that the agent is currently flying over buildings as part of the navigation task.
